title: May we PLEASE keep the shield support item in game?
body:
It is literally my fave item in the game at present. I LOVEEEEE IT.

Please let us keep it. PLEASEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE

And incase you don't know what the item is, it's the new one that looks like this
http://i.ytimg.com/vi/WzgIW_ZAxxU/hqdefault.jpg


{{item:3840}} 

There, this thing!
